attributes.action: Make M.P's answerable to criminal charges the same as everyone else including bribery , corruption , embezzlement and fraud
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In light of recent developments about M.P's expenses paid out to family members for doing nothing (out of the tax payers money).Is it not only right that they face criminal charges the same as joe public would and not just walk away from police investigation scott - free ? these M.P's are no better than working class folk but seem to be above the law , it is time to put this bang to rights and send out a loud and clear message that the British tax payers will not be taken for fools

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
